text:
What I read says that Win7 upgraded to Win10 will continue to activate when
Windows is reinstalled on that same system due to the cloud based activation key
which is created during the initial upgrade.
%40googlegroups.com

metadata.topic: Re: Win 7 no longer upgrading to Win10 - no more reinstalling PCs
